bibl.title: Was Matthew Written before 50 CE? The Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew.
bibl.note: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). - À propos de: Carsten Peter THIEDE, Papyrus Magdalen Greek 17 (Gregory-Aland P64). A Reappraisal, ZPE 105 (1995) pp. 13-20 et pl. IX. - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 42 (1995-1996) No. 980.
bibl.seg: PARKER D.C., Was Matthew Written before 50 CE? The Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew.

P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). - À propos de: Carsten Peter THIEDE, Papyrus Magdalen Greek 17 (Gregory-Aland P64). A Reappraisal, ZPE 105 (1995) pp. 13-20 et pl. IX. - Non vidimus. Cf. Internationale Zeitschriftenschau für Bibelwissenschaft 42 (1995-1996) No. 980.
